item.title: Gold Rush to Madness: Nevada City's Twisted Tale of Progress and Preservation
item.description: In a whirlwind tour of Nevada City’s recent developments, this gonzo-style report paints a vivid picture of a small California town grappling with change. From the closure of a beloved restaurant to ambitious economic plans, and from therapy dogs in courtrooms to battles against wildfires, the town emerges as a surreal blend of small-town charm and modern challenges. The piece captures Nevada City’s struggle to preserve its heritage while adapting to the 2020s, all narrated with Hunter Thompson-esque flair and biting satire.
